Future-Ready Digital Products

We design, build, and launch complete applications for visionary teams.

OBS is a full-service software engineering company based in Aramoun, Lebanon and specialising in launch-ready web applications, mobile apps, and cloud platforms. We combine research-driven design with reliable engineering to deliver products that scale.

Latest Launch

OBS Commerce Cloud

A composable eCommerce platform engineered for hyper-growth retailers. Built with an event-driven architecture and powered by Firebase.

  • Multi-tenant SaaS infrastructure
  • Realtime analytics dashboards
  • Automated CI/CD release pipeline

What we do

Launch-ready software, delivered end-to-end

From market validation to production deployment, OBS assembles dedicated product teams to build digital experiences your customers will love.

Product Discovery & UX

Align on the right problem before writing a single line of code. We conduct user interviews, prototype journeys, and build design systems to accelerate delivery.

  • Customer journey mapping
  • Design sprints
  • Interactive prototyping

Full-Stack Engineering

Our engineers craft resilient frontends and scalable backends with TypeScript, React, Flutter, Firebase, and cloud-native services tailored to your business goals.

  • Modular architecture planning
  • API & microservice development
  • Automated quality pipelines

Launch & Growth

We deploy to secure cloud infrastructure, establish observability, and deliver training so your team can iterate confidently post-launch.

  • Infrastructure-as-code delivery
  • Reliability & monitoring playbooks
  • Customer success enablement

Case studies

Recent flagship builds

Healthcare

PulseLink Telemedicine Suite

Multi-platform virtual care experience connecting patients and clinicians with secure messaging, video visits, and integrated EHR workflows.

  • HIPAA-compliant infrastructure
  • Realtime vitals streaming via Firebase
  • Patient onboarding in under 3 minutes
Fintech

Novus Capital OS

Cloud-native banking core with modular services for digital wallets, compliance, and risk analytics.

  • Serverless transaction processing
  • Self-service partner onboarding portal
  • 99.99% uptime across global regions
Retail

Orbit360 Experience Platform

Unified shopping journey that merges in-store beacons, AR product previews, and unified loyalty programs.

  • Headless commerce architecture
  • Predictive recommendations engine
  • Omnichannel analytics dashboards

How we partner

An integrated process built for velocity

OBS operates as an extension of your product team. Our multidisciplinary squads bring together product strategists, designers, engineers, and DevOps specialists working in unified sprints.

Learn about our culture

  1. Discover

    Define product vision, measure success, and prototype customer journeys.

  2. Build

    Iterate through design, development, and QA with continuous stakeholder demos.

  3. Launch

    Deploy to production, enable observability, and train your team for sustained growth.

Tell us about your idea and we will assemble a dedicated OBS product squad within two weeks.
